column4: The version on the banshee-project website will have been released after ubuntu 8.10 was released, they have a policy of normally issuing only security and bug fixes until the next ubuntu release
im running ubuntu 8.10 64bit, should i use 1.2.1(from my synaptic package manager or 1.4 ?

I would stick with with the version in the repo's, that way if there are any security updates you get them automatically, if you install from a non-ubuntu repo, you might find that you don't get future updates
